item.title: Build a .NET Context-Aware Generative AI Chatbot using Amazon Bedrock and LangChain
item.description: Generative AI is taking chatbots to the next level by empowering them to engage in human-like dialogues. These advanced conversational agents understand and respond to complex queries, provide personalized assistance, and even generate creative content. This blog post shows how to build a context-aware chatbot using Amazon Bedrock and LangChain in a .NET environment. The choice […] Link to article: https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/dotnet/building-context-aware-generative-ai-chatbot-using-amazon-bedrock-and-langchain-in-net/
